login_description: Enter your work email to be redirected to your company's login page.
zoom_link_info: Please log in to finish linking your new Zoom account.
zoom_link_failed: Failed to link Zoom: {{error}}. Please try reconnecting from your profile.
error_missing_zoom_input: Please provide either a Join URL or a Meeting ID.
error_auth_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your inputs.
error_no_session_id: Server did not return a session ID.
error_no_token: Server did not return an auth token.
error_test_auth_failed: Test authentication failed. Please check your session ID.
